{"id":1242120873,"question_id":4,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1714097344,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1242120873/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Median of Two Sorted Arrays","memory":"45.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public double findMedianSortedArrays(int[] A, int[] B) {\n\n        int aLen = A.length;\n        int bLen = B.length;\n\n        int len = aLen+bLen;\n        int[] arr = new int[len];\n        System.arraycopy(A, 0, arr, 0, aLen);\n        System.arraycopy(B, 0, arr, aLen, bLen);\n\n        if(len%2==0){\n            quickSelect(arr, 0, len-1, len/2-1);\n            quickSelect(arr, 0, len-1, len/2);\n            double a = Double.valueOf(arr[len/2-1]);\n            double b = Double.valueOf(arr[len/2]);\n            return (a+b)/2;\n\n        }else{\n            quickSelect(arr, 0, len-1, len/2);\n            return Double.valueOf(arr[len/2]);\n        }\n    }\n\n    private void quickSelect(int[] arr, int st, int ed, int k){\n\n        int len = arr.length;\n        if(st>ed) return;\n\n        int pivotIdx = partition(arr, st, ed-1, ed);\n        swap(arr, pivotIdx, ed);\n        \n        if(pivotIdx==k) return;\n        else if(pivotIdx<k){\n            quickSelect(arr, pivotIdx+1, ed, k);\n        }else{\n            quickSelect(arr, 0, pivotIdx-1, k);\n        }\n\n    }\n\n    private int partition(int[] arr , int st, int ed, int p){\n\n        while(st<=ed){\n\n            if(arr[st]<=arr[p]){\n                st++;\n            }else{\n                swap(arr, st, ed);\n                ed--;\n            }\n        }\n\n        return st;\n    }\n\n    private void swap(int[] arr ,int st, int ed){\n        int t= arr[st];\n        arr[st] = arr[ed];\n        arr[ed] = t;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"median-of-two-sorted-arrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
